title: I cant go past the log in screen, pls help :(

replies.body:
Hey there,

I'm really sorry for such a delayed response. I haven't had much time to post lately.

First off, could you run through the fixes outlined in the [connection troubleshooting](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) article.

Could I also get you to run the [ICSI netalyzr](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu/) and post back with a link to your results?
